Instruction: Blend together soy sauce, honey, vinegar, ginger, garlic powder, and vegetable oil in a blender.

Marinate the steak by placing it in a shallow glass or ceramic dish. Use a sharp fork to pierce both sides of the steak. Pour the marinade over the steak, ensuring both sides are coated. Cover the dish and refrigerate for 8 hours, or overnight.
Preheat the grill to high heat.
Grill the steaks to your taste for about 10 minutes, turning them once.
